content.description: Stand start with your hands in a good juggy crack under the roof on the right side of First Base. Work out the crack to the left side of the lip and do a techy mantle to pull up and over. You may have to heel hook - the top out is the crux.
content.location: Stand starts underneath the right portion of First Base (closest to the Warm Up area) in a good juggy crack.

content.description: Stand start underneath the roof of First Base on the right side in the same juggy crack as Stealing First. Instead of working out the crack to the lip, work right using various pockets and crimps on the roof. Top out to the right of Stealing First. Adds a couple of difficult moves.
content.location: Stand Starts as for Stealing First but goes right underneath the roof and tops out to the right as well.

content.description: On the left side of the First Base roof (to the left of Stealing First over the smaller boulder), Sit start straddling the lip with one hand and crimps under the roof with the other. Use thin crimps under the roof and around the right side to work out the arete. Grab the good jug at the top. This thing is not a gimme. Originally graded V9, (winky-face).
content.location: Sit starts on the left side of the First Base roof, left of Stealing First, on the arete. Works out the overhanging arete to the top.

content.description: First Base features a couple of great "warm-up" problems on a small roof. The top outs are cruxy.
